member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.AssistantId
member.summary: Assistant identifier to which these settings belong.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.SystemPrompt
member.summary: System prompt sent to the inference provider.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.MaxTokens
member.summary: Maximum number of tokens to generate.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.RetrievalTopK
member.summary: Number of top results to retrieve.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.RetrievalScoreThreshold
member.summary: Minimum score threshold for retrieval results (0.0 to 1.0).

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.SearchMode
member.summary: Search mode for retrieval: Vector, FullText, or Hybrid.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.TextWeight
member.summary: Weight of full-text score in hybrid mode (0.0 to 1.0). Formula: Score = (1.0 - TextWeight) * vectorScore + TextWeight * textScore. Only applies when SearchMode is "Hybrid".

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.FullTextSearchType
member.summary: Full-text ranking function: "TsRank" (term frequency) or "TsRankCd" (cover density, rewards proximity).

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.FullTextLanguage
member.summary: PostgreSQL text search language configuration. Controls stemming and stop words.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.FullTextNormalization
member.summary: Full-text score normalization bitmask. 32 = normalized 0-1 (recommended for hybrid).

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.FullTextMinimumScore
member.summary: Minimum full-text score threshold. Documents with TextScore below this are excluded. Null means no threshold.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.InferenceEndpointId
member.summary: Completion endpoint identifier (references a managed Partio completion endpoint).

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.EmbeddingEndpointId
member.summary: Embedding endpoint identifier (overrides server-wide default for per-assistant RAG queries).

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.Title
member.summary: Title displayed as the heading on the chat window.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.LogoUrl
member.summary: URL for the logo image shown in the chat window upper-left (max 192x192).

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.FaviconUrl
member.summary: URL for the favicon shown in the browser tab.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.AssistantSettings.Streaming
member.summary: Whether to enable SSE streaming for chat responses.

member.summary: Timestamp when the record was created in UTC.

member.summary: Timestamp when the record was last updated in UTC.

member.summary: Represents a model available on the configured inference provider.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.InferenceModel.SizeBytes
member.summary: Model size on disk in bytes.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.InferenceModel.OwnedBy
member.summary: Owner of the model (OpenAI only, null for Ollama).

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.InferenceModel.PullSupported
member.summary: Whether the provider supports pulling new models.

member.name: T:AssistantHub.Core.Models.InferenceResult
member.summary: Result from an inference request, carrying either a response or error details.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.InferenceResult.Content
member.summary: The generated response content, or null on failure.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.InferenceResult.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Error message describing what went wrong, or null on success.

member.name: T:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionChunkingConfig
member.summary: Chunking configuration for an ingestion rule.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionChunkingConfig.Strategy
member.summary: Chunking strategy (e.g. None, FixedTokenCount, SentenceBased, ParagraphBased, RegexBased, etc.). When set to "None", chunking is skipped and the entire document content is treated as a single chunk.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionChunkingConfig.FixedTokenCount
member.summary: Fixed token count per chunk. Default: 256. Minimum: 1. Values below the minimum are clamped.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionChunkingConfig.OverlapCount
member.summary: Number of overlapping tokens between chunks. Default: 0. Minimum: 0. Values below the minimum are clamped.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionChunkingConfig.OverlapPercentage
member.summary: Overlap percentage between chunks. Default: null. Minimum: 0.0. Maximum: 1.0. Values outside the range are clamped.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionChunkingConfig.RowGroupSize
member.summary: Number of rows per group for row-based chunking. Default: 5. Minimum: 1. Values below the minimum are clamped.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionChunkingConfig.ContextPrefix
member.summary: Context prefix to prepend to each chunk.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionChunkingConfig.Validate(AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionChunkingConfig)
member.returns: List of validation error messages (empty if valid).

member.name: T:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionEmbeddingConfig
member.summary: Embedding configuration for an ingestion rule.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionEmbeddingConfig.EmbeddingEndpointId
member.summary: ID of the embedding endpoint to use.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionEmbeddingConfig.L2Normalization
member.summary: Whether to apply L2 normalization to embeddings.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionRule.Name
member.summary: Display name for the ingestion rule.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionRule.Bucket
member.summary: S3 bucket name for document storage.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionRule.CollectionId
member.summary: RecallDB collection GUID for API calls.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionRule.Labels
member.summary: Labels to apply to ingested documents.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionRule.Tags
member.summary: Tags to apply to ingested documents.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionRule.CreatedUtc
member.summary: Timestamp when the record was created in UTC.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionRule.LastUpdateUtc
member.summary: Timestamp when the record was last updated in UTC.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionRule.FromDataRow(System.Data.DataRow)
member.summary: Create an IngestionRule from a DataRow.

member.name: T:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig
member.summary: Summarization configuration for an ingestion rule.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig.CompletionEndpointId
member.summary: ID of a Partio completion endpoint used for summarization.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig.SummarizationPrompt
member.summary: Custom prompt template for summarization. Null uses Partio default.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig.MaxSummaryTokens
member.summary: Maximum number of tokens for each summary. Default: 1024. Minimum: 128. Values below the minimum are clamped.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig.MinCellLength
member.summary: Minimum cell content length (in characters) to trigger summarization. Default: 128. Minimum: 0. Values below the minimum are clamped.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig.MaxParallelTasks
member.summary: Maximum number of parallel summarization tasks. Default: 1. Minimum: 1. Values below the minimum are clamped.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig.MaxRetriesPerSummary
member.summary: Maximum retry attempts for an individual cell. Default: 3. Minimum: 0. Values below the minimum are clamped.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig.MaxRetries
member.summary: Global failure limit across all cells (circuit breaker). Default: 9. Minimum: 0. Values below the minimum are clamped.

member.name: P:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig.TimeoutMs
member.summary: Timeout in milliseconds for each summarization request. Default: 300000. Minimum: 100. Values below the minimum are clamped.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig.Validate(AssistantHub.Core.Models.IngestionSummarizationConfig)

member.summary: Generate a response from a language model using the provided context and user message.

member.summary: Generate a response from a language model using a multi-message conversation.

member.summary: Generate a streaming response from a language model using a multi-message conversation.

Callback invoked for each content delta.
Callback invoked when generation is complete, with the full accumulated content.
